commitResults.messageTitle: Completed level 1
Added TaskList class
Edited engine to use TaskList and changed formatting of tasklist
added Task class
modified TaskList to use Task class
added Pair and Util classes, Engine not working yet
can now mark and unmark tasks with very minimal exception handling
added Deadline, Todo and Event classes, Engine support and parsing still not implmented
can now add 3 different types of tasks with personal flags
Added launch script to compile and run program. Added some simple input error handling (blank/missing fields) Automated testing with runtest.sh
can now delete tasks from list
Added Either monad to help with errors.
made flatmap more general
add save tasks functionality
made directory path more generalisable
Add date functionality to tasks
commitResults.messageBody: Deadlines and events now accepts official dates as arguments instead of random strings.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add find by date functionality
commitResults.messageBody:
findbydate command allows user to find and list all tasks
that contains input date.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add simple monadic parser combinator class
commitResults.messageBody:
The class allows clients to chain different parsers together to build
specific parsers similar to parsec from haskell. Result class was also added
to work with the Parser class.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add more combinators
commitResults.messageBody: Added manyUntil, some and someUntil combinators.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add extra methods
commitResults.messageBody: Added some more combinators and general purpose parsers.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add match function similar to rust enums for Either class
Stop using unsafe get methods in Result
